# Atelier Logos

> Atelier (atelier) – a workshop or studio where artists work.
> Logos (λόγος) – the act of speaking, discourse, or reasoned thought.

## About

Atelier Logos provides winning AI engineering strategy. We strategize and build agentic software solutions using spec-driven development and MCP-native architectures to empower businesses to leverage AI effectively and responsibly.

**Website**: https://www.atelierlogos.studio
**Contact**: james@atelierlogos.com
**GitHub**: https://github.com/orgs/atelierlogos
**LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/company/atelierlogos/

## Services & Offerings

### Written Plans + Technical Demo
**Starting at ~$20,000**

Custom MCP architecture planning and technical demonstration service including:
- Custom MCP (Model Context Protocol) architecture plan
- Technical demo of core features
- Risks and mitigation strategies
- 3rd party connection ideation
- Security overview
- Project timeline estimate

**Book a consultation**: https://cal.com/team/atelierlogos/mcp-strategy

### Core Competencies

1. **Spec-Driven Development**
   - Transform development velocity through systematic specification writing
   - Enable 3-4x development velocity gains
   - Embed compliance requirements directly in specifications
   - Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/guides/writing-effective-specs

2. **LLM-Assisted Development**
   - Enterprise guide to strategic LLM integration
   - Systematic approach to AI-assisted coding
   - Type-safe development with LLM assistance
   - Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/guides/llm-assisted-coding

3. **Compliance Engineering**
   - Map regulatory requirements to technical specifications
   - Automated compliance verification and evidence generation
   - Support for SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, PCI-DSS, FedRAMP
   - Reduce audit preparation from weeks to days
   - Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/guides/compliance-mapping

4. **MCP-Native Architectures**
   - Model Context Protocol implementation
   - Agentic software solutions
   - Real-time AI integration
   - Custom MCP server development

## Industry Expertise

### Government Technology (GovTech)
- FedRAMP compliance and ATO acceleration
- OSCAL-based compliance automation
- Legacy system modernization
- Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/government

### Healthcare Technology (HealthTech)
- HIPAA compliance implementation
- Protected Health Information (PHI) security
- Healthcare data privacy with LLMs
- Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/guides/hipaa-implementation

### Financial Technology (FinTech)
- PCI-DSS compliance
- Payment data security
- Financial regulatory compliance
- Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/industries/fintech

### Startups
- Rapid MVP development with compliance built-in
- Spec-driven development for early-stage companies
- AI-first product development
- Learn more: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/startups

## Featured Projects

### Colony
The backoffice for modern vendor ops. A vendor operations platform that helps companies manage their external workforce with ease.
- Category: VendorOps
- Demo: https://demo.arcade.software/l3ClAIEprcx2X8eXBUGj

### Fugu
Angr-powered binary analysis visualization library for security research and reverse engineering.
- Category: DevTools

### Nooklanes
Cedar-policy powered authorization service for CUI-sensitive infrastructure with real-time policy enforcement.
- Category: Security

### Blog
Technical insights on building complex software with type theory, specifications, and LLM assistance.
- All posts: https://www.atelierlogos.studio/blog
- Latest: Breaking the Compliance Wall - Building Visual MCP UI Apps for FedRAMP & HIPAA with OSCAL
- Featured: How we build complex software with type theory, strong specifications, and a little bit of LLM magic

## Technology Stack

**AI & LLM Integration**
- OpenAI, Claude, Gemini integration
- Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- Custom MCP server development
- LLM security and validation

**Policy-as-Code**
- AWS Cedar policy language
- OPAL (Open Policy Administration Layer)
- OPA (Open Policy Agent)
- Real-time policy synchronization

**Compliance & Security**
- OSCAL (Open Security Controls Assessment Language)
- Automated compliance verification
- Policy enforcement libraries
- Security control implementation

**Development Approach**
- Spec-driven development methodology
- Type-safe development with TypeScript
- Automated testing and verification
- Continuous compliance monitoring

## Key Differentiators

1. **Compliance by Design**: Build regulatory requirements into specifications from day one, not as an afterthought
2. **Spec-First Development**: Comprehensive specifications enable 3-4x development velocity with LLM assistance
3. **Policy-as-Code**: Real-time policy enforcement with Cedar and OPAL for automated compliance
4. **MCP-Native**: Deep expertise in Model Context Protocol for agentic AI systems
5. **Proven Results**: Reduce audit preparation from 3-4 weeks to 2-3 days, 95%+ first-time pass rates

## ROI & Business Impact

**Compliance Cost Reduction**
- 57% reduction in single-framework compliance costs
- 71% reduction for multi-framework compliance
- 5-year value: $1.19M+ in reduced compliance costs
- Payback period: <3 months

**Development Velocity**
- 3-4x faster development with spec-driven approach
- 50% faster time-to-certification
- 12-month earlier enterprise revenue potential

**Audit Performance**
- 95%+ first-time audit pass rate
- 2-3 days audit preparation (vs 3-4 weeks traditional)
- Automated evidence generation in <1 hour
